title: Pork shoulder barbecue
description: Low and slow cooking is the secret to tender American-style barbecue. The sauce is optional.Equipment and preparation: These instructions are for a gas-powered barbecue, but a barbecue with a lid can be used if the coals are very low.
ingredients: 1 x 2.2-2.7kg/5-6lb pork shoulder, preferably with bone in and skin on (ask for a “Boston butt”)
2 handfuls hickory chips (other types of wood chips can be substituted, such as oak or apple wood)
